titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Penn CAJS: RAR MS 85.126.20a-b: Judeo-Arabic treatise on anatomy

notesStmt.note: The title, or subject, of each paragraph appears as an incipit in enlarged characters, or in the margin. Arabic diacritic signs are provided when necessary. Fols. from a medical treatise, including paragraphs on the back, hand and kidneys (fol. 1), rib cage (fol. 2), and nose (fol. 3).

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library). Cairo Genizah Collection (Dropsie College. Library).
